articles.author: cue
articles.title: 'Don't cry for me Argentina': Brazil mock rivals' World Cup upset - The Straits Times
articles.description:
The result was met with mirth among Brazilians, whose beloved Selecao lost the 2021 Copa America final to Messi's team.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: RIO DE JANEIRO - Few experiences can compare to watching a World Cup in Brazil: the borderline-obsessive football passion; the explosion of pride around the national team. And the schadenfreude when … [+872 chars]
